tool.name: Gdal_Translate
tool.description: Convert raster data from one format to another.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_Result $output_data_Result name Gdal_Translate Format '$Format' GCP '$GCP' InputDSN '$InputDSN' OutputDSN '$OutputDSN' prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: Format
param.label: Format of the output data
param.help: Select the output format by usig short name of the format (use gda-config --formats for list of available formats on your platform).

param.name: GCP
param.label: Ground Point Control
param.help: Ground Point Control in the form : pixel,line,eating,northing(,elev).

param.name: InputDSN
param.label: The input data source name
param.help: The input data source name to use as source for convertion.

param.name: OutputDSN
param.label: The output data source name
param.help: The output data source name to use as source for convertion.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
